Text:
Will you upload the new episodes?(ep 19 and above) :)
Thx for some great torrents!
Yeah please make Episode 19, your Quality is just amazing, please keep the good work up!

@THEBADGUY1988 and Frenetus:

Don't worry, guys.  Ep. 19 coming up in a minute.

As I've mentioned before, I don't encode these videos -- "ZR" does, who posts them to Uploading.to (or whatever upload site).  And then I make a torrent out of that file.

But I'm looking to change that.  I'm tinkering around with encoding stuff myself -- I just finished one of "Luna Eclipsed", actually.  If all goes well, I will only have to wait for iTunes, not both it and ZR.
